net.flybyte.virgo.maven
Class BaseMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      net.flybyte.virgo.maven.BaseMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedBaseMojo, ImmediateShutdown, Shutdown
public abstract class BaseMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

This class acts as a base class used to initialize all the parameters and configuration settings needed for executing the both groups of mojo implementations (server and deployer).

Author:
Frieder Heugel
